service_npcs.name: Sister Aelina
service_npcs.lore: Wandering healer who says the Abysses 'breathe' under the earth.

service_npcs.name: Milo the Trader
service_npcs.lore: Always at the right place, right time. Knows the value of everything.

service_npcs.name: Borin the Blacksmith
service_npcs.lore: Former mercenary who forges mainly for those who come back alive.

service_npcs.name: Sana the Leatherworker
service_npcs.lore: Knows every beast by the texture of its skin.

service_npcs.name: Lyr the Enchanter
service_npcs.lore: Writes formulas on everything: paper, stone, metal... and sometimes people.

service_npcs.name: Orsen the Banker
service_npcs.lore: Only trusts numbers. Also keeps secrets... for a fee.

service_npcs.name: Petra the Alchemist
service_npcs.lore: Says every poison is a remedy that forgot its name.

service_npcs.name: Koru the Tamer
service_npcs.lore: Claims a good pet also chooses its master.

service_npcs.name: Elle the Wayfarer
service_npcs.lore: Travels light. Too light, some say. Says roads change at night.

service_npcs.name: Rona the Innkeeper
service_npcs.lore: Listens to everything, forgets nothing. Her rumors are worth more than gold.

service_npcs.name: Juno Materials Buyer
service_npcs.lore: Funds artisans. Hates waste and loves organized inventories.

service_npcs.name: Mara the Oracle
service_npcs.lore: Sees fragments of possible futures. Never says which is true.

service_npcs.name: Aldric Guild Master
service_npcs.lore: Has seen guilds born and die. Respects those that last.

service_npcs.name: Yuki Koro Collector
service_npcs.lore: Collects Koros since childhood. Says each card carries the echo of an ancient battle.

service_npcs.name: Velith Respec Sage
service_npcs.lore: Can erase your past choices, but not their consequences. Price increases each time.

service_npcs.name: Rewards Herald
service_npcs.lore: Distributes the kingdom's favors. Doesn't judge latecomers.

quest_npcs.name: Nina the Guide
quest_npcs.lore: Has seen too many beginners die to leave things to chance.

quest_npcs.name: Captain Rey
quest_npcs.lore: Keeps the town standing with discipline and well-placed bounties.

class_masters.name: Master Kael
class_masters.lore: Doesn't talk much. Watches your stance, then your courage.

class_masters.name: Archmage Selene
class_masters.lore: Claims magic is a memory of the world, not a force.

class_masters.name: Scout Veya
class_masters.lore: Reads tracks like others read books. Hates unnecessary noise.

class_masters.name: Shadowblade Rask
class_masters.lore: Teaches how to disappear... but especially how to come back at the right time.

class_masters.name: Mother Iona
class_masters.lore: Speaks little, listens much. Has seen panic kill more than monsters.
